title: Freshwater Biology Regional Centre (@FBRCZSI) / Twitter
body: Every year 11 million tonnes of plastics flows into our oceans, rivers & chokes waterways. But curbing plastic pollution is entirely within our means. Start by taking simple action to reduce your own use of single-use plastic #BeatPlasticPollution
